casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ronald Michael McCRARY. No. 413A14-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 15, 2015. John L. Wait, Winston-Salem, for McCrary, Ronald Michael. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of September 2015 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of September 2015."
